events.message: We have received the application for the software engineer position submitted by the candidate and are beginning the review process.
The candidate's application has been reviewed and categorised under the Engineering cluster due to relevant software development experience.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to the candidate to coordinate further screening and interviews.
Completed the initial screening call with the candidate, discussing their software engineering background and project experience.
The candidate has responded promptly to the screening feedback, expressing strong interest in proceeding to technical interviews.
Scheduled a technical interview with the candidate for next week to assess software development skills and problem-solving abilities.
